channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Blue Ocean Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Blue Ocean Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-30954|2024-08-03T07:03:40.035Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20blue%20ocean%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Blue Ocean Plugin 1.25.3 and earlier does not perform a permission check in several HTTP endpoints, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP server.

item.title: CVE-2022-30953|2024-08-03T07:03:39.866Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20blue%20ocean%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Blue Ocean Plugin 1.25.3 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP server.
